attributes.action: We request you to upgrade Parkinson’s Disease to the category HIGH RISK.
attributes.additional_details: Research has shown that breathing is compromised in people who have Parkinson’s Disease.In ‘off’ time - when the medicines are not working so efficiently it is compromised further. Catching Covid 19 could be fatal.
attributes.background: I would like Parkinson’s Disease put into HIGH RISK category. One reason is to ensure even young onset people get the Covid 19 vaccine as soon as it is available

rejection.details:
Decisions about who is at higher risk from coronavirus is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to prioritise all people who are clinically vulnerable to Covid-19, including those categorised by the NHS as at moderate risk, for any Covid-19 vaccine, if that's something you want to happen.
